title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 58 - Clinical Laboratories And Blood Banks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 58 - Clinical Laboratories And Blood Banks

State Regulations

Subpart 58-1 - Clinical Laboratories (§ 58-1.1 to 58-1.14)

Subpart 58-2 - Blood Banks and Laboratories Performing Immunohematology Testing (§ 58-2.1 to 58-2.28)

Subpart 58-3 - Clinical Laboratory Inspection And Reference Fees (§ 58-3.1 to 58-3.9)

Subpart 58-4 - Source Plasma Donation Centers (§ 58-4.1 to 58-4.4)

Subpart 58-5 - Hematopoietic Progenitor Cell Banks (§ 58-5.1 to 58-5.12)

Subpart 58-6 - Repealed

Subpart 58-7 - Repealed

Subpart 58-8 - Human Immunodeficiency Virus (hiv) Testing (§ 58-8.1 to 58-8.5 to 58-8.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 58

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 206[1][a], 574, 576, 576-a, 2164, 2500-a, 2522[6], 2528, 2776, 2904, 2904- b, 3121, 3612[6], 4175; Vehicle and Traffic Law, §1194; Social Services Law, §§ 364[2], 365-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
